setting.weather: Bright sunshine with scattered white clouds

characters.appearance: elderly fisherman, weathered face, white beard, stocky build
characters.clothing: worn blue wool jacket, canvas trousers, knit cap
characters.position: behind wooden stall displaying fresh fish
characters.action: laughing heartily while handing wrapped fish to customer

characters.appearance: young mother, 30s, auburn hair, kind face
characters.clothing: green cotton dress with brown shawl, woven basket on arm
characters.position: standing at vegetable stall with small child
characters.action: selecting apples while child reaches for bright vegetables

characters.clothing: brown leather apron over white shirt, rolled sleeves
characters.action: offering free sample to passing elderly woman

scene.mainElements: bustling village market with wooden stalls, colorful produce displays, friendly exchanges between neighbors
scene.details: baskets overflowing with autumn vegetables, fresh bread aroma in air, children playing with wooden hoops nearby, dogs lounging in sunny spots, flower garlands decorating stalls, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Tudor-style buildings framing square, church spire visible above rooftops
scene.atmosphere: warm community spirit, abundance and prosperity, genuine human connections

composition.depth: market stalls and people in foreground, buildings mid-ground, sky background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
